title: Easy chow mein for kids
description: Young children often like stir-fried vegetables because they are still crunchy - so this is a good dish for trying new ingredients. Chow mein can be served hot as a main meal or cold as a salad.
ingredients: 200g/7oz dried egg noodles (or rice or soba noodles)
50g/1¾oz green beans, peas or mangetout (fresh or frozen)
handful beansprouts, cabbage leaves, sliced pepper, broccoli florets or mushrooms (optional)
1 garlic clove, finely chopped by an adult or crushed in a garlic press
handful shredded cooked meat, prawns or tofu (optional)
1 tbsp soy sauce (low-salt version if possible)
